attributes.review: so i downloaded this app cause Trump 2020 and all that right? but as soon as i opened it my phone started turning on and off and so did my dog. i put them both in rice but only the dog started working again after 24 hrs 😔 my phone had to stay on rice for a week. i even had to get a new one because it was showing some random mans orange face every time i opened the app and so my eyes couldn’t take it anymore 😔
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: We don’t support a racist, transphobic, homophobic, misogynistic rapist and pedo. He has had 25 ASSAULT ALLEGATIONS AGAINST HIM, AND HAS RAPED A 13 YEAR OLD GIRL. If you don’t believe me, do your own research ✨✨💕💕💕More recently, trump retweeted a post of someone screaming “white power” x2 and you people still don’t think he’s racist? 😬How about the time that he tried to roll back transgender health care protections?? These are just a few instances where he has been the awful cheeto of a person🧡🧡🤧🤧 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏽‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏿‍♀️✨✨
attributes.title: no 😍😘✨

attributes.review: this app is very racist against everyone accept white people it basically describes trump as the new hitler, and i agree. strange things started happening on my phone too. my camera would have many random recordings i did not start. this app spies on you i definitely do not recommend this if you value you and your family. my settings also changed and my phone has multiple viruses DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.title: racist

attributes.review: Baddie💖✨🧚🏻‍♀️but the bad is silent💖✨🧚🏻‍♀️ I bought u some flowers✨🥺🌸 they’re dead just like your love life🤩🥰💗🧚 everyone has a plan in life🥰🤍🧚🏼‍♀️🌸 yours should’ve been plan b🌈💟😘your zodiac sign✨✨💘❤️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🦋but make it cancer🌟✨💖❣️💞💗🧚🏼‍♀️Keep smiling!☀️💞🤩🧚🏼💅🏻 Yellows My Favorite Color!💝💅🏻🧚🏼Change yourself🦋🌺🧚🏼‍♀️🌟✨🧚🏼‍♂️remove the C and E 🦋🌺🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♂️ everyone is a gift from god 💗🌸✨🧚‍♀️hope your parents kept the receipt ✨💞fall off a chair🌈⚡️🧚a rope will catch you 🌸🦋💫
attributes.title: disgusting and disappointed.

attributes.review: I got this app to see what amazing things our pedo president would do 😎🤓✨🥰But then All of a sudden a bunch of redneck racists started yelling “WHITE POWER” at me while riding on a golf cart 😟😞🤬😳 I can not help but think that downloading the app and the racist golf cart riders are related 😛 which leads to this one star rating😝😕I will be telling my friends to never install this app 😣😣😱 how about instead of installing this app we arrest the cops that killed Breonna Taylor🥰😋🥳🤩
attributes.title: This app made racists yell at me 🤬😢😝

attributes.review:
I do NOT recommend this app at ALL. It will destroy your phone because it has a bug. I have no clue why our president would do such a thing to the people he said he ”cared about”. My heart is broken, and so is my phone!😤 I never write a review but I feel like this is absolutely necessary since I care about all of you, especially gen z! ;) 
If you want an app just like this, I recommend crossy road. It is very pristine and fun! -xoxo, Roderick Heffley
attributes.title: *WARNING*

attributes.review: y’all this app is just somethin else. so yk got it to support my president. come to find out this app is CURSEDD. i went to my kitchen to  get some food and there was oranges every wheree. and then later on that day guys , i saw a monster. it was huge and i was really really scared 😓. i wanted to try the app again to make sure it was the app that was causing all of this and guess what 😱 , i got bit by a tiger 🐅. anyways, don’t download this app.!!
attributes.title: do not recommend

attributes.review: I didn’t want to believe the other reviews I’ve read about this app. I decided to against the reviews and downloaded it anyways, after I downloaded the app it became the worst thing I have EVER DECIDED TO DO!!! DO NOT waste your time on this app, you will regret it the second you press the button. I wish I could take back the moment I decided to download the app. Listen to the other reviews it will save you your precious time.
attributes.title: HORRENDOUS

attributes.review: I wanted to support our great President, but the app was trash. As soon as I downloaded the app a website opened up and it lead me through this dark hole about how we should inject bleach into our blood. I kept trying to close it and it wouldn’t let me! I was horrified and sad 😪✨🧚🏽. I can’t believe my president wants me to do that... it also glitches on me and it blows up my phone with pictures of Obama without a shirt on 😪😪
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: Do NOT get this app it totally ruined my phone. Once you log on your battery goes down by the SECOND. Now my phone can only stay on for a second. It also tinted my phone an ORANGE COLOR. This app is absolute garbage I DO NOT RECOMMEND. If you do not want to spend $900 dollars on a new phone don’t get this app...le bottom jeaannns boots with the furrr. Got the whole party lookin at herrrr. She hit the floor... people really be so rude leaving bad reviews ............. and I do it again boo bop bop.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE 😭😭😭
